definitions.definition: the curved shape made when something long and thin, such as a piece of string, bends until one part of it nearly touches or crosses another part of it:
If something runs in a loop, or is on a loop, it runs continuously, so that the same things are repeated again and again:
examples: The tape ran in a continuous loop, repeating the same songs over and over.

definitions.definition: to make a loop or curve:
examples: Loop the rope over the bar.
